# Government Tender Announcement
## Risk Management Specialist

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01024762
**Publication Date:** February 16, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** March 29, 2023 2:00 PM Eastern Time

## Procurement Information
* The Canadian Food Inspection Agency requires a Risk Management Specialist to support and provide expert advice for the creation of risk reports for the Risk and Analytics Division.
* The contract period will be from April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2024 with an irrevocable option to extend it for up to four additional one-year periods.

## Solicitation Method
This procurement is a competitive request for proposal, open to both Indigenous and non-Indigenous businesses.

## Important Documents
To obtain the RFP documents, please contact the Contracting Authority listed below.

**Contracting Authority:**
* Name: Alexander Lisowski
* Email: [Alexander.Lisowski@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:Alexander.Lisowski@inspection.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not available
* Address: Not available (document will be sent by email)

## Security Requirements
* The contract requires security screening under Common PS SRCL #06
* Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and Reliability security will be required for the contractor and its personnel.

## Disclaimer
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language.

**Attachments:**
- RFP documents are available in English at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/16/13d8dfb1a3a0e20e460cd45236ab4f58/cfia_acia-18799310-v1-2023-00639_npp_en.pdf
